segments.text: I see the water just cascading over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s making such a mess, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, standing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really struggling to keep his balance on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so mad when she sees the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is total chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the children have been doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching far into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t pull the whole jar down on himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
